data.text: Monkamfo Awurade.
Awurade kyekyere Yerusalem;
Ɔsa wɔn a wɔn koma abotow no yare,
Ɔkyerɛ nsoromma dodow a ɛwɔ hɔ,
Yɛn Awurade so, na ne tumi yɛ kɛse;
Awurade wowaw ahobrɛasefo
Monto aseda nnwom mma Awurade.
Ɔde omununkum kata ɔsoro ani;
Ɔma anantwi aduan,
Ɛnyɛ ɔpɔnkɔ ahoɔden na nʼani sɔ
Na mmom, Awurade ani sɔ nnipa a wosuro no,
Momma Awurade so, Yerusalem;
ɔma wʼapon akyi adaban yɛ den,
Ɔma wʼahye so dwo,
Ɔsoma nʼahyɛde kɔ asase so;
Ɔtrɛw sukyerɛmma mu sɛ oguan ho nwi,
Ɔtotow mparuwbo gu fam sɛ mmosea.
Ɔsoma nʼasɛm no ma ɛnan no;
Wada nʼasɛm adi akyerɛ Yakob,
Ɔnyɛɛ eyi maa ɔman foforo biara ɛ;
